transcription: I  Buddha, do you see my wallet? Because I lost it and the wallet seem to fall around the park.  Is your wallet full of money? No much, but there are a lot of valuable goods inside the wallet. Is it true you don't sell Tina's wallet? The last person in the park was you. So, you are accusing me? I didn't accuse you.  I just want to make sure whether you see it or not. If you don't accuse, don't shoot! Oh yeah, maybe my wallet didn't fall in the pub. I remember I visited Mifta home yesterday, before I went to the pub.  What do you want? It seems there is a new important thing.  Actually, your wallet fall in my home. I found it in under table. I forget to give back to you. Oh no, I already accusing Huda take Dina's wallet. Well, we must say sorry to Huda because accusing her take Dina's wallet.  Okay, where do you play?  I can't do it  wallet fall in my home Buddha, do you see my wallet? Buddha, do you see my wallet? Waste Waste
